```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lme4)

## load data
cam <- read.csv(here("data", "camera", "camera_dat.csv")) %>%
  arrange(jday)
```

## Model #1: SCMU Camera Detections
```{r mod1}
m1 <- glm(SCMU ~ image_type + hour + jday + jday^2, data = cam, family = binomial)
summary(m1)
```
